steps.step: step toward 6:00 into a forward bow as you execute a double thrusting thumb to your opponent's groin.
Execute a left hooking grab (from the outside of the arm) to your opponent's right tricep, immediately followed by a thrusting palm heel to your opponent's jaw.
Execute a step-through vertical to your opponent's groin.
Before placing your foot down, execute a knife-edge side to the inside of your opponent's left knee.
Execute a inward horizontal elbow to your opponent's face.
